nodes.name: updateClaimTime

nodes.documentation:
@dev fake function to get a virtual interest
@return balance + interest
nodes.name: balanceOf

nodes.documentation:
@dev donor can deposit an amount to an account accessible by the beneficiaries
@return deposit made by donor
nodes.name: deposit
addBeneficiary

nodes.documentation:
@dev Beneficiary can withdraw her/his share of the UBI
 interest available in deposit account is divided by the count of beneficiaries
 time of claim is updated, that beneficiaries can't claim multiple times in 24 hours
 beneficiary count is reset
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation: @dev defines when future withdrawal will be possible
nodes.name: onlyOnPayDay
updateClaimTime

nodes.documentation:

@return balance + interest
nodes.name: balanceOf

nodes.documentation:
@dev donor can deposit an amount to an account accessible by the beneficiaries
@return deposit made by donor
nodes.name: deposit
addBeneficiary

nodes.documentation:
@dev Beneficiary can withdraw her/his share of the UBI
 interest available in deposit account is divided by the count of beneficiaries
 time of claim is updated, that beneficiaries can't claim multiple times in 24 hours
 beneficiary count is reset
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation: @dev defines when future withdrawal will be possible
nodes.name: onlyOnPayDay

addBeneficiary(address).details: adds a UBI beneficiary to a mapping adds a beneficiary if the beneficiary isn't in the mapping yet beneficiaryCount is number of beneficiaries

balanceOf().details: fake function to get a virtual interest

deposit().details: donor can deposit an amount to an account accessible by the beneficiaries

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

paused().return: true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

updateClaimTime().details: Updates a time, when a claim is made with additional 24 hours now = current block timestamp claimWaitSeconds is specified in the variables on the top
updateClaimTime().return: payTime, the time when then next claim can be made

withdraw().details: Beneficiary can withdraw her/his share of the UBI interest available in deposit account is divided by the count of beneficiaries time of claim is updated, that beneficiaries can't claim multiple times in 24 hours beneficiary count is reset
